author: akyar.ozgur
title: Grow Turkey Grow Cardano
description: How can we grow the Cardano ecosystem in Turkey?
importance: Decentralisation and resilience of Cardano is based on the inclusion of different locations including those communities not involved.
success: Motivated community of developers, SPOs, stakers, voters, challange teams collaborating for the growth of Cardano from Turkey in 2023.
